questions.title: Combien de temps faut-il pour déchiffrer un mot de passe de 6 caractères ?
Ma date de naissance au format JJ/MM/AAAA est un bon mot de passe ?
In brief
questions.content: The password, a basic element of IT security, authenticates and grants access to a resource or staff service. In order to reduce the risk of identity fraud, you should choose your password very carefully and stick to some simple rules.

questions.title: A password must :
questions.content:
• have at least 12 characters.
  • be changed regulary.
  • be for personal use.

questions.title: A password mustn't :
questions.content:
• be a name or a word from dictionary.
  • be your login.
  • be linked to you (birthdate, etc.)
